segments.text: I notice the boy’s determination to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on that stool like a circus performer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him with such excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at their teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely missing the fun happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, but it’s not ruining the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will share the cookies with his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles, but he steadies himself like a pro.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s open palm is so hopeful and sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like they’re in their own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is chaotic, but it’s also kind of heartwarming.
segments.speaker: PAR
